# gitlab_member_role (Data Source)

The `gitlab_member_role` data source allows details of a custom member role to be retrieved.

**Upstream API**: [GitLab GraphQL API docs](https://docs.gitlab.com/api/graphql/reference/#querymemberrole)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "gitlab_member_role" "example" {
  id = "gid://gitlab/MemberRole/1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Globally unique ID of the member role. In the format of `gid://gitlab/MemberRole/1`

### Read-Only

- `base_access_level` (String) The base access level of the custom role.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp of when the member role was created.
- `description` (String) Description of the member role.
- `edit_path` (String) The Web UI path to edit the member role
- `enabled_permissions` (Set of String) All permissions enabled for the custom role.
- `iid` (Number) The member role ID integer value extracted from the `id` attribute
- `name` (String) Name of the member role.
